description: A traditional recipe with all the seasonal and festive flavours.
name: Honey Glazed Turkey Breast with Cranberry Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium turkey breasts, trimmed and butterfly cut
0.5 medium sourdough loaf, torn into small pieces
1 small red onion, peeled and grated

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Combine all of your stuffing ingredients in a mixing bowl.
Slice your turkey breasts open and place the stuffing mix inside. Place the turkey breasts on a baking tray and cover with some of the glaze.
Bake in the oven for 45 minutes but take out to glaze twice throughout cooking time. Remove from the oven and suggested serving would be mash or roast potatoes.
